title: What are the most trending technologies in Java currently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Latest trends in Java Technology 2020: Unit testing: Another popular Java development trend to consider is Unit testing for the coming year. When you opt for serverless architecture then unit testing becomes a must-have requirement to follow by developers. RESTful Web Services: One more thing that will hit the space in 2020 is REST web services REST API can be implemented securely using Spring in Java. Spring Security 5: It is a major up-gradation in Spring 5 ecosystem. Several bug fixes were made in the fifth version of Spring so that it can be effectively used by enterprises. Reactive Java: It is another relevant programming concept with new features and innovations. the amount of data collected daily is increasing and we need powerful processing tools for analyzing the collected data. Data Science: Java for Data analysis is not an exception here. Because of the availability of a large number of Java libraries. It offers excellent machine learning, AI, data analysis, and cloud computing capabilities. Serverless Architecture: When some application is based on microservices, you could change or replace different Java components independently. In, Java, you can AWS Lamda services that can combine microservices with serverless functions. Wireless app Development: Wireless app development in Java has gained immense popularity because of its open-source nature. With Java, you can make things much easier than expectations. Compatibility with Older versions: Java is a statically-typed programming language. It can be managed easily with a smaller number of bugs. It supports a backward compatibility feature where it can be made to run over older versions if needed. Mobile App Development 2020: Android is still dominating the IT marketplace with 80 percent of the total market share. Around 17 percent market is covered by apple apps. It is clear that Java is key behind mobile app development's latest trends. Java & the IoT: Because of specific Java features, it is possible adding life to IoT. With the help of Java ME edition, you can design more secure enterprise apps for the Internet of Things. Thanks for reading.

Even now, Java is the most popular language and technology trend popular among all developers. Java is continuously growing in demand. Popular frameworks and platforms elsewhere have been based on Java — such as Hadoop, Android and likewise. A lot of tools support is available in Java such as JDK (JDK 6, 7, 8, and the latest, Java 9), IDE (IntelliJ, Eclipse, etc).. Popular development trends such as IoT are also basing their platform on Java primarily. There are a number of technology/frameworks popular currently among Java developers.
